metadata.title: Re:Bible - Daily Reflection, Sharing the Journey of Faith
metadata.description: A digital Bible platform tailored to modern lifestyles

hero.title: Daily Reflection, Sharing the Journey of Faith
hero.subtitle: A platform that provides opportunities to easily access and reflect on Bible verses tailored to modern lifestyles, and share personal faith experiences.

community.title: Community
community.description: Share reflections and prayers with fellow believers

phase1.title: Foundation Building
phase1.description: Develop core features and conduct beta testing
phase1.details: Implement user authentication, establish Bible content database, develop basic meditation features, and conduct initial user testing to gather feedback.

phase2.title: Community Expansion
phase2.description: Enhance social features and diversify content
phase2.details: Introduce user interaction features, implement group study functionality, add various Bible translations, and expand content offerings including devotionals and commentaries.

phase3.title: AI Integration and Personalization
phase3.description: Implement AI-based personalization and global expansion
phase3.details: Develop AI-powered meditation recommendations, introduce multi-language support, create features for connecting with local churches, and optimize the app for global markets.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Through Re:Bible, we create a global faith community where all Christians can easily and meaningfully access the Bible in their daily lives, share personal reflections, and grow together.

footer.description: Re:Bible is a digital platform that brings the timeless wisdom of the Bible into your daily life, fostering a global community of faith and reflection.
